Name: Candice DeBébé's Tantalising Tricks
About the game: Cand3ce... In a galaxy on the brink of war, only the chosen one can save us all... Join Candice, Krystal, and all of their friends and frenemies, on their turn-based trans-galactic RPG tryst through the tempests of time, across seven planets. Boost your abilities as Candice with the Brandi Sisters' treatments, or steal them from your enemies as Krystal. Win over friends and civilisations in this ticking timebomb to all-out destruction. Discover ancient, dark secrets, and unleash scandalous romances while hurtling through space itself. Level up, and save us all from their greatest challenge yet! ...Cand3ce... a brand new me... * A 10-20 hour turn-based RPG epic * Find out the shocking truth behind Candice, in this finale to the web of secrets spun throughout the first two games * A tantalisingly tangy soundtrack * Status effects that are actually worth using * Voluptuous voice acting * A variety of beetle-based sidequests * A modicum of romance * Sensationally trick throughout
